ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Day of Decision will be their appointment all together:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Day of Final Decision is the appointed time for all;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The appointed time for all of them will be the Day of Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the Day of Decision is the appointment for all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, the Day of Judgement is the time appointed for all of them --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely the day of separation is their appointed term, of all of them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely the Day of Decision shall be their appointed time, all together,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly the Day of Decision is the term for all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, the Day of Decision is the appointed time for all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the Day of Distinction is the term appointed for all of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Day of Judgement is the tryst for them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily the Day of sorting out is the time appointed for all of them,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, the Day of Judgement (when Allah will judge between the creatures) is the time appointed for all of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The Day of Decision is the appointed time for all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day of Sorting Out is the appointed time for them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:40] Assuredly the Day of Decision, the Day of Resurrection, in which God will decide between servants, will be the tryst for all of them, for everlasting chastisement;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly the Day of Decision) the Day of judgement between created beings (is the term of all of them) is their tryst,
